references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRFs, a fundamental concept for the research in this paper.
This paper introduces GPT-4, a large language model that is crucial to the approach in this paper.
This paper introduces ShapeNet, a dataset used for training and evaluation in this paper.
This paper introduces nf2vec, a meta-encoder used in this paper.
This paper introduces LLaVA, a multimodal large language model used in this paper.
